sentence: I feel so comfortable in the lobby and love the location
The hotel rooms are super nice with free wifi and all the amenities you could want
Lemon water in lobby

Been staying at this hotel everytime come to UF nice facility clean room they could do a better job at front desk it is a nicely located in downtown with a lots of option for restaurantit is overprice for sure
The Hampton Inn and Suites has an excellent location close to great restaurants and bars comfortable and clean rooms and nice perks like free gummy bears in the lobby
The valet was awesome three minute check in great lobby terrific room all clean and modern
The amenities are nice breakfast valet parking fitness center
Pros great location and very nice room with basic amenities
The hot breakfast is a great touch as is the selection of complementary snacks and citrus infused water in the lobby
Friendly staff accommodating lobby
I had informed them ahead that I wanted a room close to the elevator because of bad knees
I only wished for better parking accommodations
When I stayed in the hotel in the spring there was a sign in the gym that said due to this weeks storm the treadmills and elliptical do not work
Unfortunately six months later the same sign remains and most of the equipment does not work
Snack bar for purchase in lobby is just unbelievably priced high which is odd to me
Reminds me of a dirty college gym from 1980 ’s instead of a hotel
We stayed on the second floor where the elevators open directly into a makeshift dining area with public bathroom on one side and rooms on the other
The staff were sullen and cut us off to catch the elevator no greetings or smiles
We have visited this facility over eight different times in the past six months and have NEVER been disappointed in any area
Also one elevator went out and then the other started working intermittently causing LOTS of lines and problems especially around check out time
